summary: Admin Panel with client management and impersonation feature fully tested. Backend: 14/14 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All admin panel features working correctly including client list, summary panel, impersonation flow, and access control.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/admin/clients requires authentication (401)
Backend: GET /api/admin/clients requires admin role (403)
Backend: GET /api/admin/clients returns client list with metrics
Backend: GET /api/admin/clients/{id}/summary requires authentication
Backend: GET /api/admin/clients/{id}/summary requires admin role
Backend: GET /api/admin/clients/{id}/summary returns client summary with recent submissions, 30-day metrics, billing status
Backend: GET /api/admin/clients/{id}/summary returns 404 for invalid client
Backend: POST /api/admin/impersonate requires authentication
Backend: POST /api/admin/impersonate requires admin role
Backend: POST /api/admin/impersonate returns client info for valid client
Backend: POST /api/admin/impersonate returns 404 for invalid client
Backend: GET /api/dashboard/overview with impersonateClientId returns impersonated client data
Backend: GET /api/submissions with impersonateClientId returns impersonated client submissions
Backend: GET /api/assets with impersonateClientId returns impersonated client assets
Frontend: Admin login (admin@forgevoice.com / admin123) works
Frontend: Admin Panel loads at /dashboard/admin with client list
Frontend: Client table shows name, plan, submissions count, last activity
Frontend: View button opens Client Summary panel with 30-day metrics and last 5 submissions
Frontend: Impersonate button starts impersonation and navigates to Overview
Frontend: Yellow impersonation banner appears with client name and Return button
Frontend: Overview page shows impersonated client data (Alex Chen Media)
Frontend: Banner persists when navigating to other pages (Submissions)
Frontend: Return to Admin View button stops impersonation and returns to admin panel
Frontend: Toast notifications appear for impersonation start/stop
Frontend: Non-admin users redirected away from /dashboard/admin
Frontend: Admin Panel link hidden in sidebar for non-admin users
Frontend: Help '?' button shows tour toasts
critical_code_review_comments: Admin endpoints properly protected with require_admin dependency
Impersonation is view-only (client-side state) - no server-side session modification
impersonateClientId query param correctly used for data fetching during impersonation
ImpersonationBanner component properly positioned with fixed top and z-50
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Panel feature is complete. New endpoints: GET /api/admin/clients, GET /api/admin/clients/{id}/summary, POST /api/admin/impersonate. Frontend has ImpersonationBanner component and AuthContext with startImpersonation/stopImpersonation functions. All routers accept impersonateClientId query param for admin impersonation.

mocked_integrations.video_generation: MOCKED - Kling, Runway, Veo providers return sample video URLs
mocked_integrations.audio_generation: MOCKED - ElevenLabs returns placeholder audio URL
mocked_integrations.thumbnail_generation: MOCKED - DALL-E returns placeholder image URL
